title: Ideal Series 1-4 DVDRip XviD
description:
Ideal Series 1-4 DVDRip XviD

All episodes are DVDRip XviD and are numbered correctly. The X-mas Special is included with series one, and the extras for series two and three are included as well.

The previous torrent I uploaded had mis-numbered episodes in series one and series three. If you downloaded the first torrent, stop the torrent, rename the main folder from "Ideal.S01-S04.DVDRip.XviD" to "Ideal.Series.1-4.DVDRip.XviD" and delete the folder "Ideal.S01.DVDRip.XviD" and the folder "Ideal.S03.DVDRip.XviD". Then download this torrent. You will only have to re-download the first and third series. I apologize for the mix-up. Both series are scene releases, so I didn't think to make sure the episodes were in order.
